main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Waverly, New York, with descriptions of lights and a metallic object observed by an air traffic controller and a United Airlines flight crew.
interesting points: The sighting involved three lights, one larger than the others, observed to be yellow with red flashes., An air traffic controller and United Airlines flight crew witnessed a metallic, circular object hovering silently for 15 minutes before it rapidly ascended out of sight., The lights appeared to move straight up and down very rapidly, rather than moving around., The duration of observation for the lights was approximately 30 minutes., The report indicates a high level of interest and skepticism from the observer, highlighting a personal encounter with UFO phenomena.
sighted object: three lights and a metallic circular object
witness description: an observer, a United Airlines flight crew, and an air traffic controller
